message: Bob, I'm offering you my product for $1,100,000.  It's a great deal for both of us - you get a valuable asset at a good price, and I can move it quickly.  Let me know what you think.
I appreciate your initial offer, but I was thinking more along the lines of $950,000. I'm interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.

Bob, I understand your budget concerns.  While $950,000 is lower than I was hoping for, I'm willing to come down to $1,050,000. This is a fair price for both of us, and it allows us to make a deal. Let's meet in the middle.
I appreciate your flexibility, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway from my previous offer, so I'll counter with $975,000. I'm hoping we can make a deal at this price.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate. I'm still a bit far from your offer, but I'm willing to go down to $1,000,000. This is the lowest I can go while still feeling comfortable with the deal.  Let me know if this works for you.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me at $1,000,000, but I'm still a bit short of my budget. I'm willing to go up to $995,000. That's the best I can do.
